DOC.brief_summary: This is a comparison of pregnancy achievement between two GnRH antagonist protocols which differ in the timing of GnRH antagonist initiation.
DOC.brief_title: Fixed Versus Flexible Gonadotropin-releasing Hormone (GnRH) Antagonist Initiation
DOC.criteria: < 39 years of age BMI 18.529.9 <= 3 previous IVF cycles PCOS Endometriosis
